name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in implementing **Azure**, utilizing **Infrastructure as Code** tools such as **Terraform**, **ARM Templates**, and **Bicep** to create resilient cloud solutions. My proficiency in **Zero-Trust-Security** principles, combined with tools like **Defender for Cloud** and **Sentinel**, ensures robust security and compliance with industry standards. I have a strong track record in developing cloud-first strategies and aligning governance practices with cloud services while adhering to compliance requirements.
In addition to my cloud expertise, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer skilled in modern **JavaScript/TypeScript** and **Python**, with hands-on experience in **Flutter** technologies. I have built high-performance platforms leveraging frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My background in developing enterprise-grade solutions that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing showcases my ability to deliver innovative solutions. I possess a robust foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, which further supports my commitment to building secure applications in compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I have experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Fluent in both German and English, I can effectively communicate within diverse teams.
